attributes.action: Hand back the Elgin marbles to Greece
attributes.additional_details:
The marbles were taken to protect them from the Turks and now they need to be returned to their rightful place. The Greeks have built a museum to house them.
This is the correct course of action.
attributes.background: The time has come to return these historic monuments to the Acropolis from where they were stolen. There is no logical reason for them to remain in the UK.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the trustees of the British Museum.

You might like to sign this petition calling for changes to allow the British Museum to accept requests for the repatriation of artefacts: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632459
